title: Aaron Boupendza
text:
Aaron Salem Boupendza Pozzi (born 7 August 1996) is a Gabonese professional <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> who plays as a <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> for Qatari club <a href="Al-Arabi%20SC%20%28Qatar%29">Al-Arabi</a> and the <a href="Gabon%20national%20football%20team">Gabon national team</a>.
Career.
Boupendza is a youth exponent of Gabonese club <a href="CF%20Mounana">CF Mounana</a>.
In August 2016, Boupendza signed for <a href="Ligue%201">Ligue 1</a> side <a href="FC%20Girondins%20de%20Bordeaux">FC Girondins de Bordeaux</a> to play for the club's reserve team in <a href="Championnat%20National%203">Championnat National 3</a>. In August 2017, he joined <a href="Championnat%20National">Championnat National</a> side <a href="Pau%20FC">Pau FC</a> on loan. In August 2020, Boupendza signed a two-year contract with Turkish club <a href="Hatayspor">Hatayspor</a>. In August 2021, he joined <a href="Qatar%20Stars%20League">Qatar Stars League</a> club <a href="Al-Arabi%20SC%20%28Qatar%29">Al-Arabi</a>.
Honours.
Individual
